title: My brand new Pixel 4 phone wont connect to android auto in 2018 chevy equinox
content: got a new 2.0 cord. reset factory settings and reset everything tired to down load some other app from google for car play but apparently this is not compatible with my 4. I switched from apple 2 years ago to the pixel 2 glad i am still in my 14 day return because i am feeling like its time to take back the 4 and go back to apple.
